"The Subpalette":
"The \"Subpalette\" is a system that lets you register items and Class Skills in advance, then use them quickly and easily when you need them. You can register up to 10 things per Subpalette.

Use <%SubPaletteLeft> and <%SubPaletteRight> to move the Subpalette cursor left and right, then use <%SubPalette> to use whatever is in the currently selected slot.
If playing with a keyboard, you can also use the number keys to activate Subpalette slots directly."
